sentences.literal: Shang Zhang Da Yuan Xian second year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘三十二，小餘二百七十七；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder thirty two, small remainder two hundred seventy seven;

sentences.literal: Large remainder fifty two, small remainder sixteen;

Duameng Chi Fen Ruo fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五十，小餘五百三十二；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty, small remainder five hundred thirty two;

You Zhao Shetige Zheng He first year.

Qiang Wu Shan E second year.
